content: **low vision accessible pattern available** **accessibility statement ** this pattern has a print disability and screen reader friendly version that version has 23pt arial font no italics are used with written instructions the pattern contains images all of which have alt text and captions abbreviations and symbols have been removed from the pattern the pattern has been reviewed using the word read aloud function in adobe acrobat **pattern introduction** it seems that no matter the brand there are two major types of scrubby yarn the kind that has little strings coming off of it and the sparkly version i decided to pair up the major types of scrubby yarns into one scrubby jubilee yarn was the clear choice with its jubilee scrubby dish yarn and jubilee scrubby sparkle the advantage to using jubilee yarns for this pattern is that color coordination is easy peasy lemon squeezy the same colors and fun color sets are available in both the regular and sparkle versions so you can create a beautifully blended cleaning collection with the striped scrubby pattern you will knit flat in garter stitch with some stripes added in for a bit of fun and extra scrub power this quick knit will take you less than an hour to complete and it looks fabulous around the house for a gift or even to sell at your next craft fair if using this pattern for sales please credit me as the designer happy knitting **skills** this project is suited for knitters who are comfortable with or who are open to learning the following skills and techniques cast-on knit knit with two colors bind-off **materials** **yarn recommendations** jubilee scrubby dish yarn fiber content polyester 100% 43 yards/40 meters 50 g or any similar yarn that knits to gauge **and** jubilee sparkly dish yarn fiber
